Translations.Text: Kapherara bale, amara kakhana'o e kora'ane bisbasa karaba na ebam era purbabarti kitabe'o naya. Apani yadi papisthaderake dekhatena, yakhana taderake tadera palanakartara samane damra karano habe, , takhana tara paraspara katha katakati karabe. Yaderake durbala mane kara hata, tara ahankariderake balabe, tomara na thakale amara abasya'i mumina hatama.
Ahankarira durbalake balabe, tomadera kache hedayeta asara para amara ki tomaderake badha diyechilama? Baram tomara'i to chile aparadhi.

Durbalara ahankariderake balabe, baram tomara'i to dibaratri cakranta kare amaderake nirdesa dite yena amara allahake na mani ebam tamra ansidara sabyasta kari tara yakhana sasti dekhabe, takhana manera anutapa mane'i rakhabe. Bastutah ami kapheradera galaya beri paraba. Tara se pratiphala'i peye thake ya tara karata.
Kona janapade satarkakari prerana kara hale'i tara bittasali adhibasira balate suru kareche, tomara ye bisayasaha prerita hayecha, amara ta mani na.
Tara ara'o baleche, amara dhane-jane samrd'dha, sutaram amara sastiprapta haba na.
Baluna, amara palanakarta yake iccha riyika bariye dena ebam parimita dena. Kintu adhikansa manusa ta bojhe na.
